titles.title: 574 We Limit Not The Truth Of God (easy sweet)

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
We limit not
The truth of God
To our poor reach of mind
By notions of our day and sect
Crude partial and confined

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Now let a new and better hope
Within our hearts be stirred
The Lord hath yet
More light and truth
To break forth
From His Word

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Who dare to bind
By his dull sense
The oracles of heaven
For all the nations
Tongues and climes
And all the ages given

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
The universe how much unknown
That ocean unexplored
The Lord hath yet
More light and truth
To break forth
from His Word

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Darkling our great
Forefathers went
The first steps of the way
'Twas but the dawning
yet to grow
Into the perfect day

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
And grow it shall
Our glorious Sun
More fervid rays afford
The Lord hath yet
More light and truth
To break forth
From His Word

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
The valleys past
Ascending still
Our souls would higher climb
And look down from
Supernal heights
On all the bygone times

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
Upward we press
The air is clear
And the sphere-music heard
The Lord hath yet
More light and truth
To break forth
From His Word

verse.name: v5a
verse.lines:
O Father Son and Spirit send
Us increase from above
Enlarge expand all
Christian hearts
To comprehend
Thy love

verse.name: v5b
verse.lines:
And make us all
Go on to know
With nobler powers conferred
The Lord hath yet
More light and truth
To break forth
From His Word
